https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y7jfZxSaeKtIQR5CLoPNBhiBnyF.jpg Sex Fashion and Disco is a documentary film concerning Antonio Lopez (1943-1987), the most influential fashion illustrator of 1970s Paris and New York, and his colorful and sometimes outrageous milieu. Antonio Lopez 1970: Sex Fashion & Disco
